string.text: {=TN5hbc7f}It's good to be out of captivity.
{=j9CHWmr5}Thank you for paying my ransom.
{=5OKXtEW6}It was most generous and noble of you to secure my freedom.
{=pWQwULg1}How much did you need to pay to free me? It's not coming out of my share of the loot, what?
{=53MDeyby}Well... Those bandits back there didn't give us too much trouble.
{=GXR9KGBn}Chasing down bandits like that... I suppose it has to be done.
{=g3a9dmzu}Those bandits never give us much trouble, but it is good practice I suppose.
{=2AsFNABs}Every time we run down another group of those bandits, I think, that could have been me, had fate worked out a bit different.
{=ifNalTNK}Well, that's one fewer group of bandits preying on travellers. But there will be more. There always are.
{=mabEK2R8}I hear you recently caught some bandits. Speaking as a merchant, we appreciate any efforts to make the roads safer.
{=9aS4em4L}I hear you recently caught some bandits around here. I say 'good work,' and I think other merchants around here will agree. Cleanse the roads of those vermin, so that trade can flow.

{=LZlTOKIH}I hear you recently caught some bandits around here. Well, as a merchant, I appreciate that it will make the roads safer. Hopefully other desperate men will be deterred from going into a life of crime and villainy.
{=2R19RV70}I hear you took {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.
{=Kn0sd9dR}I was here when your people come over our walls. I do not know why they spared me. So many were not so lucky.
{=AiamDgVH}I watched your people come over our walls... I suppose I am grateful that they spared my life.
{=CXbZjUzR}I was here when your people came took our city... It was not as bad as we had feared. If you ordered them to spare us, well, I suppose I should thank you for that mercy.
{=W3F2HgTN}I hear you took the fortress of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. A blow well struck!
{=iNYL0cJ5}I hear you took {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Good work.
{=hjcjbEYn}I hear you took {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. I hope you made them bleed for what they did to us.
{=A7nmHKBr}I hear you took {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. I hope the cost in lives was not too high..
{=gQcyHNVT}I hear you took the fortress of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. No doubt you found some traitor to let you through the gates.
{=00fZGqbJ}A hard day's work, taking {ENEMY_SETTLEMENT}. But worth it.
{=tUc0CIs4}I will never forget how we came over the battlements of {ENEMY_SETTLEMENT} and put its defenders to the sword.
{=Iz9jimvM}I will not forget the taking of {ENEMY_SETTLEMENT}... All sieges are terrible, even victories.
{=FaQ02Yet}I'm not going to forget {ENEMY_SETTLEMENT}... A hard fight, but a glorious one.
{=3Ksb1Hlu}Well... Taking {ENEMY_SETTLEMENT}... That wasn't as bad as I'd feared.
{=dJMfIABx}I hear you defeated our enemy {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER} in battle.
{=ALIAwlgz}I heard that you fought and defeated {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}. I wish you joy of your victory, my friend!
{=obydBl7I}I heard that you beat {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}... This is good.
{=bb8AxGwc}I heard that you fought and defeated {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}. A blow well struck!
{=SM16wIcc}So, you crossed swords with that rascal they call {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}, and emerged victorious. Good work.
{=LaPJJMCD}I heard that you fought and defeated {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}. Every dog has its day, I suppose.
{=7vcCSGEN}I heard you defeated {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}, even though he had you outnumbered. Most impressive.
{=ddUxQwOX}I heard you defeated {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}, even though he had you outnumbered. I salute you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}!
{=dpaagbUb}So {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER} came at you with a great big host and you whipped him anyway. Heh. Good work.
{=jH77WXL2}There's a great deal of talk about you - how you beat {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER} even though you were outnumbered. Is that really what happened? Somehow I doubt it.
{=f0TZ7BRb}I hear you defeated {DEFEATED_LEADER_RELATIONSHIP} in battle.
{=RGNIuSCM}I hear you defeated {DEFEATED_LEADER_RELATIONSHIP} in battle. I appreciate a worthy adversary.
{=iEaXFpUF}I don't know what treachery you used to defeat {DEFEATED_LEADER_RELATIONSHIP}, but it will not work against me.
{=WzMjUSGv}I hear you defeated {DEFEATED_LEADER_RELATIONSHIP}. You're a wily foe, but I've run you to ground and now I shall finish you off.
{=pJtkSopk}I hear you defeated {DEFEATED_LEADER_RELATIONSHIP} in battle. I'm here to even the score.
{=BCNRS2ml}I hear you defeated {DEFEATED_LEADER_RELATIONSHIP} in battle. Well, I always knew you'd be a dangerous enemy.
{=tciR9VSr}I hear you fought {DEFEATED_LEADER}, and won. {?GENDER}Her{?}His{\?} mistake cost us the lives of many brave men.
{=2zjTq6N8}I hear you defeated {DEFEATED_LEADER_RELATIONSHIP} in battle. I won't pretend that I grieved too much when I heard that.
{=ndagvVPz}I hear you defeated {DEFEATED_LEADER_RELATIONSHIP} in battle. But don't think that I will fall so easily for your tricks.
{=hl1AFy3m}I hear you defeated {DEFEATED_LEADER_RELATIONSHIP}. Hah! It would have amused me to see {?GENDER}her{?}him{\?} cower before you.
{=QXrxVZHJ}I hear you defeated {DEFEATED_LEADER_RELATIONSHIP}. Well, I won't comment on {?GENDER}her{?}his{\?} standard of generalship, but that can't have been too difficult.
{=kWGF47Mc}You won our last battle. That won't happen again.
{=Z6XSaq8b}When last we met, you had the better of me. But I assure you that it will not happen again!
{=dtaIcOa0}You won last time we fought. I look forward to a chance to even the score.
{=Xt1V4D6X}You emerged victorious from our last contest of arms. I congratulate you, and look forward to a chance to even the score.
{=Kf45xPSd}You may have won last time we met, but that won't happen again.
{=QbXjHb7y}You won last time we met. I hope you enjoyed your little victory. You won't have another one. Your tricks won't work twice.
{=8qkWFWTa}When last we met, {PLAYER.LINK}, you had the better of me. If we ever meet in battle again, perhaps things will go differently.
{=zFfRLbxK}Don't think I have forgotten our little battle. Now I know your tricks. If ever we are at war again, well, things will go differently.
{=x8WJb01D}I don't begrudge you your victory, the last time we met. I'm glad we no longer have to fight.
{=cQbIMImo}I will not forget our victory over {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}.
{=6KMf8lNE}I remember our victory over {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}. I will not forget your bravery in that battle.
{=VcXpFIrT}Remember how we whipped {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}, and made of his men a feast for the crows? That's a sweet memory.
{=YsUq0lPJ}Whatever comes next, I will not forget how we once fought together against {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}.
{=M43kLIaa}We may have fought together against {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}, but even that cannot make up for everything else you've done.
{=BYZXoAly}I remember our victory over {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}. I am grateful for the aid. But if you think you can call upon that favor, you are mistaken.
{=9HvWdW77}I hear you've been trying to take the credit for our victory over {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}. I was on the battlefield too, you may remember.
{=H1t6YIMv}I will always cherish the memory of our battle against {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}. May all our battles be equally glorious.
{=3vO2C8hO}My friend, I will never forget how we watered our last battlefield with the blood of {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}'s men. I hope you have the stomach for more.
{=gaHeS3qu}I will not forget our victory over {DEFEATED_PARTY_LEADER}. Let us once again give thanks to heaven, and pray that we not grow too proud.
{=mwF92doJ}I remember our last battle. It was a good fight.
{=lzQYayR0}I remember our last battle. It was a good fight. Have you come for another?
{=9VBbSF33}I remember our last battle. You should know better than to cross paths with me again.
{=cVgKHCqa}I remember when my allies and I last faced you. It was a good fight.
{=QD7wWIdW}Do you remember when we left the fields red with your men's blood? I do.
{=WobMdST8}I remember when we last met. Your side put up a good fight.
{=q5SZRgUR}I hear you came to blows with {VICTORIOUS_PARTY_LEADER}, and you were driven from the field.
{=bI2XZrAk}I hear you came to blows with {VICTORIOUS_PARTY_LEADER}, and he gave you the thrashing you deserved.
{=JNub3xzU}It was hard going back there against {ENEMY_TERM}. I'm glad we all made it out alive.
{=B8Kb89jk}That battle against {ENEMY_TERM}. You failed, and we both paid the price.
{=A7iiTdng}I hear {ENEMY_TERM} beat you, but you put up a hard fight.
{=r7yWwaY3}I hear you fought bravely against {VICTORIOUS_PARTY_LEADER} until you were finally overwhelmed by superior numbers.
{=JCzju3in}I heard {ENEMY_TERM} beat you, but it cost them a lot of men. Good.
{=alO2F63A}I hear you fought bravely against {VICTORIOUS_PARTY_LEADER} and made the {ENEMY_TERM} pay heavily for their victory. I salute your courage and your men's sacrifice.
{=n0SpScdp}So apparently you're a tough bite to swallow. I hear {VICTORIOUS_PARTY_LEADER} paid heavily in blood to defeat you.
{=XLqklKR5}I hear {VICTORIOUS_PARTY_LEADER} ran you down. Some speak of heroic last stands, but I say a defeat is a defeat.
{=DcRDdH6d}I hear {VICTORIOUS_PARTY_LEADER} ran you down and gave you the thrashing you deserve.
{=LaBhR4Vm}I hear {VICTORIOUS_PARTY_LEADER} defeated you. Fear not, we will give them back double.
{=DcRDdH6d}I hear {VICTORIOUS_PARTY_LEADER} ran you down and gave you the thrashing you deserve.
{=rUda85FW}You took {SETTLEMENT_NAME} from us. We will not forget this.
{=pT6QqtTB}I heard that you have besieged and taken {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.
{=W3F2HgTN}I hear you took the fortress of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. A blow well struck!
{=k4MKDRJH}You have taken {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. So be it. I would have done the same, in your shoes. But I shall retake it.
{=vxkoCCuc}I hear you'll be joining us in the service of {TT_LIEGE.NAME}.
{=Pf44U15I}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Pray do not disgrace us by behaving in a cowardly fashion.
{=DzpcTVWI}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. I look forward to fighting alongside you against our foes.
{=e0WSVhxu}I hear you'll be joining us in the service of {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Well... Do yourself a favor, and stay out of my way.

{=UKTXefOD}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Fight hard against our foes, respect your betters, and don't cross me, and we'll get along fine.
{=zTNNxMzz}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. If I were he, I would not trust you to clean the sculleries.

{=yZZx1WVQ}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Fight bravely and you will be well-rewarded. Betray us, and we shall make of you the kind of example that will not soon be forgotten.

{=e8Lec4g2}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. I do not pretend to be happy about his decision, but perhaps it is better to have you inside our tent pissing out, than the other way around.

{=ndQo81VN}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. That is good. The more skilled fighters we have with us in these troubled times, the better. I shall be watching your progress.

{=AtbVSdJi}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. No doubt you will soon betray him, and I will have the pleasure of watching you die a traitor's death.

{=fjthM3fE}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Excellent... I am sure that you and I will become very good friends. But remember -- if you betray us, it will be the biggest mistake you will ever make.

{=952DmRsV}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Well, I can't say that I would have trusted you, but perhaps you deserve the benefit of the doubt.

{=ADCkcVUn}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Good {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}! Our {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} is a noble soul, and rewards loyalty and valor with kindness and generosity.

{=O0acjJR9}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Alas, from what I know of you I fear that you will disgrace us, but I will be happy if you prove me wrong.

{=cWRudt73}I heard that you have pledged allegiance to {?TT_LIEGE.GENDER}the lady{?}lord{\?} {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Fight against our foes with valor, but also with honour and compassion. A good name is as valuable as a sharp sword or a swift horse in affairs of arms.
{=Sxga9UOp}It's good to have you fighting alongside us.
{=b55tdDVs}So, you've signed up to fight alongside us. I'm glad that you're on our side.
{=pmw8vTs8}Let's see if you're worth what we're paying for you.
{=qdMJ3HN3}So, we've taken you on as a mercenary. I'm not sure I'd trust you.
{=keJgUALH}Well... I can forgive many things, but it is hard to forgive treason.
{=CwJonOjV}You're a rebel and a traitor, {PLAYER.LINK}, but somehow I still can't bring myself to hate you.
{=lMFCQOJL}You rebelled and broke your oath of fealty to me, {PLAYER.LINK}. Expect no mercy.
{=WZ2K83Z4}You rebelled and broke your oath of fealty to me, {PLAYER.LINK}, but now the Heavens have delivered you to me.
{=SCvFN6Ap}Your rebellion against {TT_LIEGE.NAME} was an act of treason.
{=rINfrA70}You rebelled against {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Now, expect the punishment due traitors.
{=CfYJZXok}You rebelled against {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Look, I know you well. I'm sure you had your reasons. But you shouldn't have done that.
{=Q5eT72ba}Your rebellion against {TT_LIEGE.NAME} makes us enemies. But to be honest, I rather prefer things that way. Better to have the serpent outside your tent rather than in, wouldn't you say?
{=ucKrwFCj}I heard that you renounced your allegiance to {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Well, that is your decision.
{=3CKuk4Nj}I heard that you renounced your allegiance to {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Let us pray that we may not come to blows.
{=lsgsuRva}I heard that you renounced your allegiance to {TT_LIEGE.NAME}. Well, we're better off without you.
{=dNNcebar}So perhaps now you're regretting renouncing your allegiance to {TT_LIEGE.NAME}?
{=yzxJBMJd}I hear you looted a caravan under my protection. I am not pleased.
{=udMxMICB}I hear you looted a caravan under my protection. I'm going to assume that this was a misunderstanding.
{=tMET9a0Q}I see you have helped yourself to one of my caravans... I am not kind to thieves. Perhaps I shall take your hands and eyes as compensation.
{=PzBfkDIF}You looted a caravan under my protection. Look, it's war, we all do things... But was there really a need for that?
{=jqOmOSQZ}Amongst war and death, trade alone keeps this great land together. If you insist on raiding my caravans and further undermining this world's prosperity, than I must defeat you.
{=bOKqn4dN}Spare my caravans next time and find the courage to attack me directly.
{=qEZR7adT}I can't stand idle while you disrupt my trade routes and raid my caravans, you must be brought to justice.
{=rlLqbDCQ}You cost me a great sum of coin when you raided my caravan. I wonder if I could regain it through the sale of your organs.
{=LXMcIObA}My peasants tell me a man bearing your description looted their goods and coin. I suppose I should be grateful you didn't burn the buildings to ground.
{=LXMcIObA}My peasants tell me a man bearing your description looted their goods and coin. I suppose I should be grateful you didn't burn the buildings to ground.
{=LXMcIObA}My peasants tell me a man bearing your description looted their goods and coin. I suppose I should be grateful you didn't burn the buildings to ground.
{=LXMcIObA}My peasants tell me a man bearing your description looted their goods and coin. I suppose I should be grateful you didn't burn the buildings to ground.
{=S28aK0oF}I ask, for the sake of your honor, that you not raid anymore of my caravans.

{=FxTlch69}You must think me a truely weathly man to raid my caravans and expect that I would not notice. I'll assume your actions were meant as a compliment, and that you'll find other means of income.
{=VSyOVMge}Rather than brand you a traitor, I will assume that you were too base and foolish to recognize that it was MY caravan you were attacking and not an enemies.
{=9DDmAvXD}Apparently my family believes that we might make a good match.
{=dkuhmSPi}So! What a wedding... I look forward to a happy married life with you.
{=z76zznAS}Congratulations to you and {FIRST_NAME} on your marriage.
{=C6iJs2Ih}So.. You married {FIRST_NAME}. No doubt you'll both be very happy.
{=YEoEaMRJ}You stay away from {FIRST_NAME}.
{=jhnPucu3}So... We're both courting the fair {FIRST_NAME}.
{=WROObSl4}{SIDE1TROOP} insulted {SIDE2TROOP}.
{=al0vHv5D}I insulted {SIDE2TROOP}.
{=e5viS3jv}{SIDE1TROOP} insulted me.
{=dlfG8Bdx}{SIDE1TROOP} and {SIDE2TROOP} quarreled over their love for {SUBJECT}.
{=yjDRCuQx}I am glad we were true to our word with {COMMENT_REFERENCE_HERO}.
{=SoCaUHhH}There's something I can't stay silent about... You broke your word to {COMMENT_REFERENCE_HERO}. This is hard for me to accept.
{=Nnqgix3X}I am glad that you look after your men well.
